description:
While riding the train to Pythagoras Production`s joint camp, R remembers the time when Marginal #4 was founded.
Even though they are such a tight-knit group now, in the beginning everybody had solo or other group careers and were not looking forward to becoming Marginal #4.
So what was the reason that everybody is giving it their all now?
The secret past of Marginal #4 is just about to be revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 夏から追憶[めぐ]るカンブリア
